Author: secretweightloss
Text: I feel the same. When I first started I was on 1500-1800 a day depending on exercise. Then I found 1200 is plenty and did that for a while, then that felt too much so I did 1100, then 1000. Now 800 feels like a lot and the idea of eating 1200 calories is terrifying

Author: 2queer4ubabe
Text: I don't know if this helps but I could relate (pre-recovery) and I'm sure many others can/could too. You're not alone in this I promise.
